Rime Armor.name: Rime Armor
Rime Armor.flavor: Ice crystals spread across your body, embracing you in their cold caress.
Rime Armor.effect: You gain immune cold and a +10 power bonus to AC. Each time an enemy attacks you, reduce the power bonus by 1 (by 2 if the attack has the fire keyword). Any time an enemy hits you with a melee attack, the enemy takes 20 cold damage and is slowed until the end of your next turn. This effect lasts until the power bonus falls to +0 or until the end of the encounter.
